channel.title: Misc on Ross Knapman
channel.description: Recent content in Misc on Ross Knapman

item.title: Recipes
item.description: A collection of my favourite recipes, stored here so that I can access them easily from wherever, and send them to friends. All recipes are vegan, except where I have added a note on what to change to make it vegan, or where it is obvious (e.g. cheese to vegan cheese; butter to vegan butter or spread). Coconut Chickpea Curry Kale and Leek Bake Coconut Curry Lentil Soup Vegetarian Peanut Soup Lentil Soup Chana Masala Vegan Paella Bulgur Salad with Cucumbers, Red Peppers, Chickpeas, Lemon & Dill 1-Hour Vegan Shepherd’s Pie Vegan Fall Pasta Salad Spiced Lentil and Butternut Squash Soup Vegan Goulash with Smoked Tofu and Potatoes Mom’s Ultimate Vegetarian Lentil Loaf Texas Caviar Hot German Potato Salad Spiced Aubergine Bake Sweet and Sour Chickpeas Peppers Broccoli Hearty Mushroom Goulash Frankies Vegan Burrito with Spanish Rice Healthy 5-Ingredient Granola Bars Quick N’ Healthy Vegetable Pasta Salad Vegan Spinach and Artichoke Pasta Spicy Tomato Gnocchi With White Beans, Spinach and Vegan Sausage Vegan Garlic Noodles Easy Vegan Spinach and Mushroom Lasagna Curry Chickpea Salad Wraps with Toasted Coconut Honey Mustard Lentil Vegetable Salad (replace honey with agave or maple syrup) Vegan Mac and Cheese Vegan Sweet Potato and Peanut Enchiladas Greek Pasta Salad with Easy Greek Vinaigrette Vegan Caesar Pasta Salad with Chickpeas Vegan Butternut Squash Mac and Cheese Vegan Pumpkin Pasta with Spinach and Mushrooms Gnocchi With Garlic Tomato Sauce (but maybe double the ingredients, as this only makes enough for about 2 meals) Chickpea Frittata With Sage and Rosemary Vegan Tuna Slow Cooker Tofu Butter Chicken (Vegan) Vegan ‘Egg’ Salad Sandwich Vegan Fajita Pasta with Chickpeas and Peppers Vegetable Cacciatore with Rotini Vegan Macaroni Salad Tofish and Chips Flavourful Pea Pulao with Lemon
